docs.title: Addicted Products is a real fictional service that questions the model of constant ownership and proposes a scenario in which a product can be shared without the active decision of a person, but based on its own needs as a product
The Aesthetic Pleasure in Design Scale: The Development of a Scale to Measure Aesthetic Pleasure for Designed Artifacts
The  Development  of  a  Reliable  and  Valid  Scale  to  Measure  Aesthetic  Pleasure  in   Design
